did.unittitle: Dorothy Donnell Steers Collection of Coleman Dowell Letters
did.abstract: Dorothy Donnell Steers (1925-2016) was a friend of Coleman Dowell from Simpson County High School in Franklin, Kentucky. This collection consists of seven letters from writer Coleman Dowell to Steers. In the letters, Dowell discusses his recent writings, asks for Steers' opinion on his works, shares updates on his family, and expresses his hopes for a reunion with his high school friends.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of seven letters from writer Coleman Dowell to Dorothy Donnell Steers. In the letters, Dowell discusses his recent writings, asks for Steers' opinion on his works, shares updates on his family, and expresses his hopes for a reunion with his high school friends.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
